so_16169515: date -d 'today 00:00:00'

date -d 'today 00:00:00' "+%s"

midnight=$(date -d 'today 00:00:00' "+%s")
now=$(date "+%s")
diff_mills=$(( ($now - $midnight) * 1000 ))

midnight=$(date -d 'today 00:00:00' "+%s.%N")
now=$(date "+%s.%N")
diff_mills=$(echo "( $now - $midnight ) * 1000" | bc)
